sentence: Everywhere on the property the staff smiled and said hello and were of the friendliest sort
The service at the meals in the Red Level Lounge and the Concierge was very good
Our room was upgraded to oceanfront king upon check in and the staff was very kind and accommodating
We were red level guest so we had access to free breakfast every morning private checking in and checking out and a complimentary happy hour every day with limitless free drinks
The staff Everyone seemed extremely nice and courteous at the Gran Melia
Staff wonderful hotel conditions in a scale 0 to 10 I will give 5 check hiding charges before booking Not satisfied
The pool was huge and perfect the beach beautiful the staff friendly and not too far from the San Juan airport
The staff is great I would recommend this hotel the rooms are wonderful we stood for 5 nights
This facility needs to hire new management new service staff and start over
Staff was great restaurants nice pool amazingDistance from San Juan
Restaurant waitstaf was friendly but food took a long time to be served
More robust recruiting and training should be considered Dinner at Tiempo exceeded expectations for quality of food wine list service atmosphere
The staff front desk maintenance drivers restaurant was very attentive
Staff was ok did not have a bad experience but they do not go above and beyond for the guest
I think more training is needed for the staff on how to take care of their guests to really care

I do not know about you but this is a huge inconvenience especially when you have kids with you The rooms are anywhere from a 1525 mile walk to the main pool and entrance the golf cart staff picks you up and drops you off but they do not always come as soon as they want them to
Service training for the staff
He tried to act more like my homie than a professional bellman but whatever people have different personalities right
However they need to take Hyat out of the name because they do not meet the Hyat brand service or expectations
After we called and mentioned it to the front desk they were much more quiet for the rest of our trip
Your staff could get a few pointers from the staff at The Vanderbilt in San Juan
The staff was uninterested and distracted
When I was emailing the concierge I noted that my fiance and I were celebrating our engagement and asked about possibly paying to upgrade our room
Swim up bar service was fast servers were good walking up to the bar was slow
Pool service was spotty at best with only 1 2 people taking drink and food orders
The rest Of staff were hit or miss
Still a learning curve for some staff members but that is understandable
